name: Mood Animal
tagline: This short and simple website picks a word (or words) at random from two lists and presents them. One list contains moods, and the other contains animals.
body:
MoodAnimal
==========

This short and simple website picks a word (or words) at random from two lists and presents them. One list contains moods, and the other contains animals.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
